body_html:
It sounds like a lot of effort went into having enum in Python.

enum34 is defined in our setup.py file, which is good, but it needs to be defined in our workspace.bzl file too, just weakref. Could you or @caisq help do that?
body_text:
It sounds like a lot of effort went into having enum in Python.
enum34 is defined in our setup.py file, which is good, but it needs to be defined in our workspace.bzl file too, just weakref. Could you or @caisq help do that?
body:
It sounds like a lot of effort went into having enum in Python.

enum34 is defined in our setup.py file, which is good, but it needs to be defined in our [workspace.bzl](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/a1945729655191c511dbfea1a38b35bdfc734a09/tensorflow/workspace.bzl#L309) file too, just weakref. Could you or @caisq help do that?
